name: Cursed Race
description:
How to play Up : accelerate
down : brake
left / right : turn the car
R : restart the game
Escape : quit

The circuit is cut in sections. Each sections will give you an objective and a curse. You'll have to complete the objective to get rid of the current curse... Until the next section !

this game was created for the Kenney Game Jam 2020

Note: the game runs smoother with the desktop version

The team

Vincent F. : Programmer, UI design

Jeremy F. : Level designer, Balancing, Tests

Note about the team: This game was our first game made with Godot engine, and also our first game jam participation. Jeremy did not know anything about making games until this. We are open to any suggestions to improve ourselves :)
